name: Advanced Retirement Planner
description: Professional-grade retirement planning with complete multi-currency integration
author: Yali Pollak (יהלי פולק)
features: Permanent side panel with tabbed navigation
Enhanced chart breakdowns showing all savings components
Complete multi-currency integration (ILS, USD, EUR, GBP, BTC, ETH)
Dynamic form labels with currency symbols
Real-time currency conversion and value updates
RSU stock price integration for 60+ companies
majorChanges: NEW: Complete multi-currency integration with 6 supported currencies
NEW: Dynamic form labels that update based on selected currency
NEW: Real-time value conversion throughout the interface
NEW: Currency education panel explaining conversion methodology
NEW: CurrencyValue component for seamless async conversion
ENHANCED: BasicInputs component with dynamic currency symbols
IMPROVED: User experience with instant currency switching
FIXED: All form labels now show selected currency instead of hardcoded ₪
